Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 May 2019For me, I use options on stocks to generate income, specifically bull put spreads. This allows me to generate 40+% returns a year or so. I'll add on options on futures to bring the ROI up to about 60% and this is my target for this year.0 comments0
